sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_da0b3a452fb0301099b5d4a72799b6d1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>callback</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    MISSING_BUILD_ID = {
        "status": "Error",
        "details": {
            "errors": [{
                "code": 404,
                "message": gs.getMessage("Missing cf_build_id")
            }]
        }
    };
    MISSING_CR_NUMBER = {
        "status": "Error",
        "details": {
            "errors": [{
                "code": 404,
                "message": gs.getMessage("Missing cr_number")
            }]
        }
    };
    MISSING_CF_TOKEN = {
        "status": "Error",
        "details": {
            "errors": [{
                "code": 404,
                "message": gs.getMessage("Missing cf_token")
            }]
        }
    };
    MISSING_CF_URL = {
        "status": "Error",
        "details": {
            "errors": [{
                "code": 404,
                "message": gs.getMessage("Missing cf_url")
            }]
        }
    };
	UNABLE_TO_PROCESS_ERROR = {
        "status": "Error",
        "details": {
            "errors": [{
                "code": 404,
                "message": gs.getMessage("Unable to process the request")
            }]
        }
    };
    var result;
    var version = 'v1';
	var policy;
	
    var payload = request.body.data;

    if (!payload.cf_build_id) {
        response.setBody(MISSING_BUILD_ID);
        response.setStatus(404);
        return;
    }
    if (!payload.cr_number) {
        response.setBody(MISSING_CR_NUMBER);
        response.setStatus(404);
        return;
    }
    if (!payload.cf_token) {
        response.setBody(MISSING_CF_TOKEN);
        response.setStatus(404);
        return;
    }
    if (!payload.cf_url) {
        response.setBody(MISSING_CF_URL);
        response.setStatus(404);
        return;
    }   
	if (!payload.cr_policy) {
		policy = "ignore";
	} else {
		policy = payload.cr_policy;
	}
	try {
        var inputs = {};
        inputs['cf_build_id'] = payload.cf_build_id; // String 
        inputs['cf_token'] = payload.cf_token;
        inputs['cr_number'] = payload.cr_number;
        inputs['cf_url'] = payload.cf_url;
		inputs['conflict_policy'] = policy;

        // Start Asynchronously: Uncomment to run in background. Code snippet will not have access to outputs.
        sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner().subflow('global.codefreshcallback').inBackground().withInputs(inputs).run();

    } catch (ex) {
        var message = ex.getMessage();
        gs.error(message);
        response.setBody(UNABLE_TO_PROCESS_ERROR);
        response.setStatus(400);
        return;
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/409723/codefresh/callback</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/callback</relative_path><request_example>{
  "number": "CHG0030065",
  "cf_build_id": "60c7bc5447895646d116db74"
}</request_example><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description>Get infor to preapre callback to Codefresh</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-15 22:32:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>da0b3a452fb0301099b5d4a72799b6d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>callback</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_da0b3a452fb0301099b5d4a72799b6d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-19 16:41:08</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Codefresh">bb4a9abb2f24701099b5d4a72799b68e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
